title: sharaNagatha vidayE
sahitya:
sharaNAgata vidhEyE shashikalAdhara jAyE duritamakhilam mama dUraya mahAmayE

anupallavi

 sharadindu vadanE suradanE sudhAgadanE haracEtO madanE shrI shankha mukha vadanE

caraNam

 praNava rUpiNi mAyA ramaNi nArAyaNi pramukha caNDa muNDAdi danuja samhAriNi 
praNatAmaya hAriNi nigamAnta vihAriNi prabhava kAriNi vana tulasI dAmadhAriNi
